message: i think carrot cake may still be my absolute fave
I think any kind of fruit crisp/crumble is my favourite (usually easy to put together in a hurry, too).
@roboticwhimsy  yes! I love cobblers and "crustless" pies for sure!
just made a batch of your chai oatmeal cookies, yum yum
I make the chocolate chip cooksies into a cookie pie (basically I'm just too lazy to scoop out cookies onto a pan when a pie plate is easier).
